EmailTemplate.name: Post Paid.Email 7- Not Launched
EmailTemplate.subject: Need help launching your store?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It looks like you haven't launched your store yet. Here are a few Bigcommerce resources to help. We’re here to help
Launch your store <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> Get help launching your store It looks like you haven’t launched your store yet. Here are a few Bigcommerce resources that can help.
Contact Support Merchants who have spoken with our experts have improved search traffic by 32% and increased revenue by 47% on average. Call 1-866-949-5336 <[[tel:+18669495336]]> or email support <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/contact]]> to get help launching and growing your business. Check out our Support Portal Find how-to articles, videos, guides and troubleshooting <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/]]> resources in our support portal. Leverage design or development experts Our global network of certified partners can help you set up and customize your online store. Find design or development experts <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/experts/]]> now. Read the Bigcommerce Store Launch Guide Inside the Store Launch Guide <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Learning/Store-Launch-Guide]]>, you will find all the steps to set up your store on the Bigcommerce platform. Launch your store <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
